short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically download media files from WhatsApp chats and groups.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically download all media files from a specific WhatsApp chat or group

You can follow 3 steps to download photos, videos or other media files from a specific chat or group:

1. Open WhatsApp Web
Navigate to WhatsApp Web and log in by scanning the QR code with your phone. 

2. Select the chat or group
Once logged in, select the chat from which you want to download images and video. Scroll up chats to select the oldest image/photo/video.

3. Download all media files
Open WA Media Downloader extension and click on DOWNLOAD button.
